    Sol LeWitt Exhibition Book

    Often, collateral for an exhibition is meant to be supplemental. I wanted to create a book that could be curated and experienced in the same way as a physical exhibition.

    The book focuses on Sol LeWittâ€™s work with the open cube, and unfolds in to two halves. One side includes essays, interviews and other texts, while the other half includes images and visual material. References made in the texts, both to other writing and to works of art are included. This allows the reading experience is seamless and immersive.

    last updated February 20, 2016
